Html:
Hey everyone, Acenth from Curse.

Just wanted to let all the developers out there know that Curse is hiring! We have a number of .Net, PHP and Objective C developer openings.

http://www.curse.com/jobs

Also, keep up the good work on Rawr :)
If only you had a position near the DC area :( Huntsville is a bit of a trek for me :(

Hinalover wrote:

If only you had a position near the DC area :( Huntsville is a bit of a trek for me :(

True, but I would send in a resume anyways :) Heck, I moved from Alaska for the job and I love it. The contacts and things I've done and learned are priceless.
Or Minneapolis.  Though I don't know if I'd leave Symantec.
